name: Triple Ginger Molasses Soft Cookies. 100% Spelt. Vegan Recipe
description: These Vegan Triple Ginger Cookies are soft and chewy, filled with molasses, fresh, candied and powdered ginger.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup oil (I use organic non gmo canola oil or refined coconut, or use Applesauce)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix flaxmeal with 2 Tablespoons of water and let sit for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix flaxmeal with 2 Tablespoons of water and let sit for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk in the oil, molasses and sugar until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Whisk in the oil, molasses and sugar until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, mix the flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda and all spices.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, mix the flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda and all spices.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the wet to dry. Add grated and candied ginger and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the wet to dry. Add grated and candied ginger and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Press and mix into a dough. It will take 2-3 minutes to form a dough. Use hands if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Press and mix into a dough. It will take 2-3 minutes to form a dough. Use hands if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: The dough will be a non sticky, not too hard dough. Chill the dough for 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: The dough will be a non sticky, not too hard dough. Chill the dough for 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Shape into flat disks. Press the disks into sugar and place on parchment lined sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Shape into flat disks. Press the disks into sugar and place on parchment lined sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in pre-heated 350 degrees F  / 180ºc for 12-13 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in pre-heated 350 degrees F  / 180ºc for 12-13 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: The cookies will be slightly soft in the center to touch.
recipeInstructions.name: The cookies will be slightly soft in the center to touch.

recipeInstructions.text: Let them cool completely on the counter (15-20 minutes). they will harden as they cool.
recipeInstructions.name: Let them cool completely on the counter (15-20 minutes). they will harden as they cool.

recipeInstructions.text: Store in an airtight container for a few days.
recipeInstructions.name: Store in an airtight container for a few days.
